name: enlightr
title: Enlightr
desc: A complete template for modern online courses.
article:
Enlightr is a polished education template tailored for course creators, teachers, and tech educators.


  • Learn more about Enlightr
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

(CC) = Content Collections

Features

  • Blog Tags
  • Course paywall
  • Reusable components
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
